
TEMPS_NIVEAU= 150
TEMPS_MUR= 1
VITESSE_SLIM= 8
NOMBRE_DIAMANT= 15
LONGUEURX= 40
LONGUEURY= 22

#0 00 0PP00000 00P0 B0000 PP P00P0 0  0#
# 00P0 00 0  0000 0P0P0 000  P00P0D00 0#
#P00000  010  0000 0P0P0 000 MMMMMMMMMM#
#0P0D000 0  000000 00PP00P0000 0 000 0 #
#MMMMMMMMMMMM0P0 00   P00 0000 000P0000#
#P0 P000000 00P0 000 00P0  00P0  100000#
#000 00P  000 00P0  00P0  000 0000P0PP0#
#000 00P0 0P0000 0001000000P0P00  P00P0#
#  00 P0000 00P0P0000 0  0000000  D00 0#
#0 000 00 0  00 0  00000PP P00P0 0 P00 #
#00 D00P0P0000 0  000000P  P00P0 0  000#
#0P0  00P0  000 0P0P0 000  P00 0000 000#
#0000  0P0  000 0P0P0 0P0 0 P00 P0000 0#
#0  0000 0000  00 P P00P0000 000P000 0P#
# P000000 00P0 0P0000 0  00P0  P0000000#
# P000000 00 P00P0000 000P000000P0PP000#
#0 00P0 000 00P0  0SS0  000 0000P0PP000#
#0 0DP100P0000 000P000000P0P100000DP000#
